content: To build a voice agent, integrate four core components: multimodal RAG for text and image retrieval, automatic speech recognition (ASR) for live audio-to-text conversion, a safety model for content filtering, and long-context reasoning for generating accurate, grounded responses.

The process of building a voice RAG agent involves several steps: setting up embeddings and re-ranking, creating a FAISS vector store, configuring the ASR pipeline, implementing a safety guard (e.g., Llama 3.1), and constructing a LangGraph workflow.
